Description: Conical foot sherd of Chian, possibly Simple Animal Style, pottery chalice; white slip on exterior, glazed streaky brown; reserved edge of foot; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The number '361' is written in pencil on the interior surface of the foot.
Bibliographic references: Gardner 1888 / Naukratis II (p. 64, no. 757, pl. XXI, no. 757)
Möller 2000 / Naukratis, Trade in Archaic Greece (p. 252, no. 5)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 682, no. 408, pl. 21.2.14)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1059) (phase 2)
